function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global pandemic affecting Sustainable Development Goals","Impact":"Severe impact on the 17 Sustainable Development Goals","Mitigation":"Implement measures to prevent and control contagious diseases","Technologies":"Advanced medical technology, vaccination programs, public health infrastructure","People":"Global population, vulnerable groups","Owner":"Governments, international organizations, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Interdependence of sustainable development pillars","Impact":"Increased complexity in addressing environmental, social, and economic challenges","Mitigation":"Integrated approach to development, awareness and education on interdependence","Technologies":"Data analytics, sustainable technologies, educational platforms","People":"Policy makers, educators, general public","Owner":"International organizations, educational institutions, governments"},{"Description":"Impact of hospital reforms on long-term prospects","Impact":"Incompatibility of certain reforms with long-term sustainability","Mitigation":"Strategic planning, monitoring and evaluation of reforms, stakeholder engagement","Technologies":"Healthcare analytics, reform simulation tools, stakeholder engagement platforms","People":"Healthcare professionals, policy makers, patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, policy makers, regulatory bodies"}]}
